rows.title: question_a1
rows.question: Explore all databases, standards and policies from a particular subject area.

rows.title: question_a2
rows.question: Explore and learn about databases for sharing and discovering data.

rows.title: question_a3
rows.question: Explore and learn about standards to identify, annotate and share data.

rows.question: Explore and learn about policies for managing and sharing data.

rows.title: question_a5
rows.question: Are you interested in guidance and educational material?

rows.title: question_b2
rows.question: See all databases; filter based on the attributes most relevant to you.

rows.question: Filter databases according to access and deposition conditions.

rows.title: question_b4
rows.question: Read how to submit your database to FAIRsharing.

rows.title: question_b1
rows.question: Learn about types of database and their relationships to other resources.

rows.title: question_c1
rows.question: Filter on access: See those databases with open access to data.

rows.title: question_c2
rows.question: Filter on access: See those databases with partially open access to data.

rows.title: question_c3
rows.question: Filter on access: See those databases with controlled access to data.

rows.title: question_c4
rows.question: Filter on deposit: See those databases that are open to the deposition of data.

rows.title: question_c5
rows.question: Filter on deposit: See those databases that are closed to the deposition of data.

rows.title: question_d2
rows.question: See all standards: Filter on the attributes most relevant to you.

rows.title: question_d3
rows.question: Filter standards according to their use for (meta)data annotation or citation.

rows.question: Read how to submit your standard to FAIRsharing.

rows.title: question_d1
rows.question: Learn about types of standards and their relationship to other resources.

rows.title: question_e1
rows.question: Explore unambiguous, persistent and context-independent schemas.

rows.title: question_e2
rows.question: Explore data and metadata standards (terminologies, models/formats and guidelines).

rows.title: question_f1
rows.question: Explore conceptual models, schemas, and exchange formats.

rows.title: question_f2
rows.question: Explore minimum information requirements, checklists and other reporting guidelines.

rows.title: question_f3
rows.question: Explore individual controlled vocabularies, taxonomies, ontologies and other terminology artefacts.

rows.title: question_f4
rows.question: Explore terminology repositories.

rows.title: question_g3
rows.question: See all policies: Filter based on stakeholder including institutions, publishers and funders.

rows.question: Increase the findability of your resource (for humans and machines) by adding content to FAIRsharing
